title: Adcovery
longDescription:
#Adcovery allows you to reach ad-blocked users with high-performance quality native advertising.#

***

   * Install our Cloudflare app in 1minute and start earning
   * Ads fill 'whitespace' created by ad blockers
   * Easy revenue win
   * Monthly payments
   * Non-intrusive native ads
   * No upfront fees or ongoing maintenance

**FAQs**

*"What % of my website visitors use ad blockers?"*   
Most websites we work with are in the 15-35% range

*"Will this slow down my page load times?"*   
No. Adcovery ads load asynchronously, and only do so if Ad-blocked users are detected.

*"Do I need to position the ads myself?"*   
No. Adblocker's rules change everyday. The Adcovery Team will do this for you.

*"Can I have a say in where ads should show on my website?"*   
If you have a preference, just let the Adcovery Team know and they will take care of this for you ;)

*"What type of ad content does Adcovery display?"*   
Native advertising that links to Advertiser’s products or services.

*"How and when do I get paid?"*   
We pay on a monthly basis. Send us your invoice with your bank payment details and get paid instantly!

*"How can I contact the Adcovery Team?"*   
You can email us at contact@adcovery.com .
instructions:
**If you do not have an Adcovery account yet, please get in touch with us so we can create and tailor your account to your needs.**

If you already are an Adcovery customer, enter your Website ID and your API Key and click on "Finish installing onto your site".

If you have any troubles, contact us : contact@adcovery.com
author: Adcovery.com
